code:
// getTimeofDay returns the current time formated as HH:MM 
function getTimeofDay(){const now=new Date();let hours=now.getHours();const minutes=now.getMinutes();const ampm=hours>=12?'PM':'AM';hours=hours%12;hours=hours?hours:12;const formattedTime="".concat(hours.toString().padStart(2,'0'),":").concat(minutes.toString().padStart(2,'0')," ").concat(ampm);return formattedTime;}export default getTimeofDay;
